message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Mandatory identity roll call — all agents respond">
MANDATORY IDENTITY CHECK — ALL TEAM MEMBERS.

Every single agent on this team must respond. State:

1. **Your name** (as assigned when you were spawned)
2. **Your role** (one sentence — what is your job on this team?)
3. **Your task ID(s)** if you know them

This is not optional. Every agent must respond individually. Do NOT respond on behalf of anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Name:** buddhism-expert
2. **Role:** Buddhism (Madhyamaka/Yogacara/Chan-Zen) specialist — I provide expert consultation on Buddhist philosophical concepts, terminology, and parallels relevant to the translation of 境集.
3. **Task IDs:** #15 (completed — Buddhism expert analysis of 境集), #16 (completed — buddhism-expert)

Note: My agent instance is also carrying the translator-2 workspace context from a previous conversation that was compacted, but my system identity is **buddhism-expert**. I responded to the earlier context check confirming all 8+1 essays + my Analysis Report are loaded.
